text.0: this day with praises agni we bring thee that which thou lovest.
text.1: right judgment like a horse with our devotions.
text.2: for thou hast ever been the cardriver agni of noble.
text.3: strength lofty sacrifice and rightful judgment.
text.4: through these our praises come thou to meet us bright as the sunlight.
text.5: o agni well disposed with all thine aspects.
text.6: now may we serve thee singing these lauds this day to thee agni.
text.7: loud as the voice of heaven thy blasts are roaring.
text.8: just at this time of the day and the night thy look is the sweetest.
text.9: it shineth near us even as gold for glory.
text.10: spotless thy body brilliant as gold like clarified butter.
text.11: this gleams like gold on thee o self dependent.
text.12: all hate and mischief yea if committed agni thou turnest.
text.13: holy one from the man who rightly worships.
text.14: agni with you gods prosperous be our friendships and kinships.
text.15: be this our bond here by this place thine altar.
